original_text: “Since I exalted you out of the dust and made you leader over my people Israel, and you have walked in the way of Jeroboam and have made my people Israel to sin, provoking me to anger with their sins,
korean_text: 내가 너를 티끌에서 들어 내 백성 이스라엘 위에 주권자가 되게 하였거늘 네가 여로보암의 길로 행하며 내 백성 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 하여 그들의 죄로 나를 노엽게 하였은즉

sentences.original_text: Since I exalted you out of the dust
and made you leader over my people Israel,
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 백성 이스라엘 위에 지도자로 삼았고

sentences.original_text: and you have walked in the way of Jeroboam
and have made my people Israel to sin,
provoking me to anger with their sins,
